Content: Crashes. Android suggested clear cache and then the next time it said it had a bug. Checked and an update was available. Ah, ok. Install the update and it's still crashing. Uninstall and reinstall. Same. Opens ok, albeit, slower than usual prior to the update. I get the take the new tour part. Main screen is ok. But then attempts to go to hourly or daily and it has a pause and then a crash. The crashing has resolved but Premium Plus for content that was formerly available to Premium is greed.
App Name: AccuWeather: Weather Alerts & Live Storm Radar
Strongest Sub-Dimension Definition: The app is ease to use, accessible, and respond quickly when the users interacts with it.
